metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8764 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: Roland Gruber Softwareentwicklung LDAP Account Manager before 6.3 places a CSRF token in the sec_token parameter of a URI, which makes it easier for remote attackers to defeat a CSRF protection mechanism by leveraging logging.

criterions.comment: ldap-account-manager: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
